aboutMeText: I am a graduate of Kocaeli University Computer Engineering. I have a keen interest in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, and Image Processing. I have experience in Natural Language Processing, Deep Learning, Docker, Unix-based systems (Ubuntu), backend development (Python, C#), frontend development (React, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript), and NoSQL databases (MongoDB). I am currently actively involved in university projects and a Talent Program, finding opportunities to enhance my technical skills. I enjoy working on real-world applications, continuous learning, and following the latest technologies. My goal is to specialize in FullStack Development and produce innovative solutions through research and development.
futureGoalText: My career goal is to specialize in AIOps (AI + DevOps) in the future, establish my own company in this field, and develop innovative solutions. In this direction, I aim to work on AI-based systems that provide efficiency by integrating technology with operational processes.

socialActivities.title: KİHMED (Kocaeli Imam Hatip Alumni Association)
description: I have been actively serving in the Youth Commission for 5 years. During this time, I served as the 'Middle School Coordinator' for 3 years.
• I helped middle school students prepare for social life by providing leadership, mentorship, and coaching.
• I organized various educational and social activities to contribute to the religious knowledge of student groups.
• I am currently serving as the vice president in the association's social media management team.

socialActivities.title: İzmitgücü FK
description: My Role in the Team and Achievements:
This team, which I founded with my friends and play football with actively every week, represents an area of great enjoyment in my life. I am the team captain, and my jersey number is 4.
We also manage our team's official Instagram page.
